pkgmetadata.longdescription: # im_utilThis package contains miscellaneous utility functions for use by other im_* packages. ## InstallUse the python package for this library. You can find the package online [here](https://pypi.org/project/im-util/).Change to your Python App Engine project's root folder and do the following:> pip install im_util --target libOr add it to your requirements.txt. You'll also need to set up vendoring, see [app engine vendoring instructions here](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/python/tools/using-libraries-python-27).
